series.name: My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic

name: Brownbeard in Grief! Luffy Lands a Furious Blow!

deck: Bruce Banner gets caught by the Hulkbusters!
description: In New Mexico, Dr. Bruce Banner, more popularly known as the Incredible Hulk is hidden underground working on his latest attempt to end his pain. Bruce was about to test the experiment. That is until General "Thunderbolt" Ross and his companion, Major Glenn Talbot interrupts and takes the entire experiment down. After their little fight and the Hulk's capture, he is lead into Gamma Base and there he is incarcerated, and he recounts his origin story in a flashback. However, watching from a distance, the sinister Leader and Gargoyle spy Gamma Base with a camera fly, and sending the Abomination to obtain the Hulk. Can the Hulk escape with his life?
name: Return of the Beast: Part One

deck: Dr. McNamara creates an iron suit that is designed to be far superior to RoboCop and gets Lieutenant Hedgecock (who hates RoboCop because he outbested him on the traning course)into the suit to prove to the Old Man that his product is far superior. The Old Man is only concerned about which product would profit the most so he has Hedgecock and RoboCop challenge one another in a competition to determine which product is superior and more profitable.
name: The Man In The Iron Suit

deck: Dr. McNamara frees The Vandals from prison and hires them to steal RoboCops charging chair,without it, RoboCop cannot be recharged. The Vandals manage to steal the chair and they try to sell it to Dr. McNamara. Will RoboCop and Anne Lewis get RoboCops charging chair back, before RoboCop runs out of power?
name: The Hot Seat

deck:
A tv reporter is under pressure from his boss,so he try to make RoboCop look dangerous,just to boost the ratings.
Meanwhile Dr McNamara sabotages AW7, OCP's latest battle tank,so it thinks everything is a target and wreaks havoc in Old Detroit.
name: No News Is Good News

deck: A man called Archer steals rich people's money and gives them to poor people.This modern age "Robin Hood" quickly becomes a celebrity in Old Detroit, but what is this robber's REAL meaning and motive? Will RoboCop stop this villain?
name: Night Of The Archer

deck:
A big cargo of illegal weapons been stolen from Metro West Police Station.
The guns quickly reappears in the streets of Old Detroit in the hands of the young gangs,and they start a gang war. 
The only hope is RoboCop.
name: Rumble In Old Detroit

deck: RoboCop & Anne Lewis are assigned as Prince Saurus and Ilmars bodyguards. They are two Middle East leaders that will sign a peace treaty. But two terrorists stole an ED-260 from Dr McNamara,and they want to use it to assassinate the two leaders, just before they write the peace treaty.
name: A Robot's Revenge

deck: RoboCop's plane crash and he got saved by an enviromental biologist.Robocop falls in love with nature and he tries to stop an OCP factory that pollutes the water and environment, but the Old Man doesn't like this idea.
name: Into The Wilderness

deck: Introducing David Wayne as Jervis Tetch seeking revenge against the jury members who had him convicted for an earlier crime. His hat contains the Super Instant Mesmerizer! Cliffhanger: Batman is drenched in Super-Fast Hardening Plaster!
name: The Thirteenth Hat

deck: Batman was able to hold his breath until he was chiseled free by Marbot the artist.
name: Batman Stands Pat

deck: Joker hopes to corrupt the kids of Woodrow Roosevelt High School. Cliffhanger: Batman & Robin are strapped to electric chairs. A slot machine is wired so when it shows three lemons, 50,000 lethal volts of electricity will zap the Dynamic Duo!
name: The Joker Goes to School

deck: Just as the slot machine spins the third and deadly lemon, Gotham City has a power blackout. Some cops are able to cut Batman & Robin free before the power could come back on and fry them.
name: He Meets His Match, The Grisly Ghoul

deck: Introducing ? as False Face, a master of disguise. Cliffhanger: Batman & Robin are glued to railroad tracks by super epoxy and are about to be run over by an incoming train!
name: True or False Face

deck:
Alfred, thru a cryptic radio message, contacts the Dynamic Duo. Batman tells him to short-circuit the Battransmitter. This allows him to get one hand free and use the Batlaser to free Robin and himself just in time.

Malachi Throne is properly credited as False Face in this episode.
name: Holy Rat Race

deck: Cyclops is distracted by a vision of Jean during a battle with Juggernaut, costing the X-Men the battle.  Emma soon after offers to erase Jean from Scott's memory forever... But things soon take a turn for the worst when Emma finds a secret memory in Scott's head that shows the true nature of the X-Mansion explosion!
description: Cyclops is distracted by a vision of Jean during a battle with Juggernaut, costing the X-Men the battle. Emma soon after offers to erase Jean from Scott's memory forever... But things soon take a turn for the worst when Emma finds a secret memory in Scott's head that shows the true nature of the X-Mansion explosion!
name: Breakdown

series.name: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H.

name: Way of the Dee Dee/Say Uncle Sam/Tribe Called Girl

deck: Mike Brokowski is one of the worst officers on the Townsville Police Force. When his lazy habits get him fired, he blames his troubles on the girls, and tries to destroy them.
name: Cop Out

deck: The girls try to join a superhero organization, but they must prove themselves to do so by tests of strength, speed, and smarts.
name: Members Only

deck: Ichika Orimura attends Infinite Stratos Academy as its only male student.
name: All My Classmate are Female

deck: Spider-Man envies Deadpool's free-spirited life, but may change his mind after one day in his world.
name: Ultimate Deadpool

description: Cyborg and Robin get into an argument and Cyborg quits the team. The team then has to face Plasmus without Cyborg.
name: Divide and Conquer

description: Blackfire comes to Titans Tower and seems to get along better with the Teen Titans than Starfire. But she has a secret plan that won't bode well for Starfire.
name: Sisters

description: The Titans battle against Jinx, Gizmo, and Mammoth members of the villain organization The Hive sent by Slade for their final test and lose, with Robin going missing. The Hive members then kick the remaining Titans out of their tower and take over. Robin returns and the whole team fights to kick the Hive out of their home. Despite their defeat, Slade was pleased with the outcome.
name: Final Exam

description: Thunder and Lightning enjoy wreaking havoc with their superpowers. Slade, disguised as an old man, offers to help Thunder and Lightning with their powers.
name: Forces of Nature

description: Cyborg's power cell dies during a battle with Mumbo Jumbo. He is taken and repaired by Fixit.
name: The Sum of His Parts

description: During a battle with Dr. Light, Raven loses control of her powers, which makes the Titans worried. Later, Beast Boy and Cyborg goes to Raven's room to apologize, but knock her door down, and Beast Boy discovers a strange-looking mirror, which sucks him and Cyborg into alternate realm where they meet various Emoticlones, the different emotions and personality traits of Raven. Unbeknownst to them, they've stumbled upon a portal into Raven's mind, which causes an adverse effect on Raven. Raven enters the realm and finds Beast Boy and Cyborg, just as her anger appears in the form of her father, Trigon. Raven fuses with her other Emoticlones to take down her father. The ordeal brings Raven closer with Beast Boy and Cyborg, who stay besides her as she fought her anger.
name: Nevermore

description: The Titans receive a package containing puppets modeled after themselves. The Puppet King uses the puppets to trap the souls of Robin, Cyborg, and Beast Boy and takes control of their bodies. While trying to do the same to Raven and Starfire, Raven uses her powers to stop him, causing their souls to switch into each other's bodies. The girls resolve to learn how to use the other's powers while in each other's bodies. At the Puppet King's headquarters, Raven and Starfire manage to use each other's powers to stop the Puppet King and break the controller, returning all the souls to their respective bodies.
name: Switched

description: A mysterious new villain called Trident appears and starts stealing nuclear waste from ships. While on a mission to stop Trident, The Titans meet Aqualad, an aquatic hero who knows more about Trident's plot, and his sidekick Tramm, who helps rebuild the T-Ship while the Titans search for Trident. While Starfire and Raven fawn over Aqualad, Beast Boy and Aqualad quarrel over who is better. They eventually realize that Trident is more than one person and soon discover a colony of Tridents. Playing on Trident's ego, Beast Boy gets all the Tridents to quarrel with each other. The Titans then lock the remaining clones in a cave.
name: Deep Six

description: While Robin is away checking on leads about Slade, the rest of the Titans deal with a new villain, Red X, who takes them down with ease. Red X tries forming a partnership with Slade, but is tasked with retrieving two other computer chips. Starfire discovers that Robin has not been true about his work. After Red X gathers the final computer chips, Slade appears, revealing he knew that Robin was Red X the whole time, and grabs the chips. The Titans arrive at the scene and stop Red X while Slade escapes. Robin reveals himself and chases after Slade, who taunts Robin about their similarities and his obsession over him. The two engage in combat, which ends with Robin overpowering Slade, who is revealed to be a robot. Starfire later approaches Robin about the past events, telling him that Slade and he share one thing in common their distrust of others.
name: Masks

description:
The Teen Titans are captured by the villain with a British accent, Mad Mod. In his madhouse, he attempts to "teach them a lesson" by hypnotizing them. Robin breaks free and chases after Mad Mod. After failing to catch him, he finds and rescues Starfire, and later both of them rescue Beast Boy. Later on, Raven and Cyborg escape their prisons on their own, and revive Beast Boy from his hypnotized state (Beast Boy is very susceptible to hypnosis).

All of them agree that the only way to stop Mad Mod is to capture him take his cane, which seems to control everything in Mad Mod's mad school. The Titans spot him and pursue him, but he can do seemingly impossible things that the Titans can't, and no matter what the Titans do, they always end up going in circles.

After the Titans chase and fail to capture him, Mad Mod reappears and scolds them for failing his lessons and tries to make them repeat the lessons. Robin tells everyone to get to Mad Mod and get his cane, and a huge battle between the Titans and Mad Mod's army of robots ensues. The Titans are captured one by one, and Robin is the only one who reaches Mad Mod. When he lunges for the cane, his hands go right through it like it isn't there, but Mad Mod handles it as if it were a real thing! Realizing that Mad Mod is just as fake as the rest of the school, Robin jumps through a hole in the wall, where the real Mad Mod (an old man) is revealed to be hiding a bunch of complex machines to create an illusion. Robin destroys the machines and captures the REAL Mad Mod, allowing him and the other Titans to escape the school. After once again awakening Beast Boy, they all go home.
name: Detention

deck: Ichika VS Cecilia.
name: Class Representative Selection Match!

description: Slade threatens to stop time in the city with a Chronoton Detonator. While searching for the device, Robin, on edge about the dream he had just before the mission, attacks everything in sight, including an innocent bystander. After violently sneezing, Starfire, allergic to metallic chromium a component of the detonator unwittingly becomes a tracker for the device. In the sewer, Robin is separated from the team by Cinderblock. After taking Cinderblock down, Robin finds Slade's tracking device, using it to get to Slade's headquarters, he fights Slade for detonator's remote. The rest of the Titans chase after Slade's henchmen carrying the detonator in a speed boat. Upon discovering that the device is fake, the Titans are blasted by a gun, which infected them with lethal nanoscopic probes. Wanting to keep the Titans safe, Robin becomes Slade's apprentice.
name: Apprentice, Pt. I

description: Starfire is trying to commemorate the Tamaranian holiday Blorthog, a festival of friendship, but is disheartened at the sight of the rest of the team's constant fighting. When Warp, a villain from the future, comes back in time to steal an antique, Starfire follows Warp as he prepares to jump through time, arriving 20 years into the future. She searches for the Titans for help, but finds the team broken up. She attempts to rally the Titans together to take down Warp and return back to her time.
name: How Long Is Forever?

description: A lonely Beast Boy goes into the city as a green dog when the rest of the team is too busy for him. He gets captured by a spaceship and played with by the alien Soto, who believes him to be his original dog. Meanwhile, the other Titans have noticed Beast Boy has gone missing, and end up chasing Soto's dog, believing it's their teammate.
name: Every Dog Has His Day

description: The Titans meet Terra, a girl with the power to move the Earth around her, and invite her to stay with the Titans, much to Beast Boy's splendor. A seemingly great addition to the team, Terra later confesses to Beast Boy about her inability to control her powers. While on a mission with the Titans, Terra is confronted by Slade, who knows her secret and taunts her with it. Terra later leaves after the rest of the Titans learn her secret.
name: Terra

description: When Cyborg beats Atlas, a self-proclaimed full robot, in an online video game, he challenges Cyborg to a real, physical fight. Due to the limits on his strength while Atlas has none, Cyborg loses to Atlas. Atlas then kidnaps Robin, Starfire, Raven, and Beast Boy as his prize and challenges Cyborg to a rematch where his friends' lives are at stake.
name: Only Human

description: The Titans defeat Control Freak at a video store and receive a scary movie free as reward. After watching the movie, the Titans are awakened by screams and find the tower under siege by mysterious monsters similar to those in the movie, with Raven unable to use her powers. One by one the Titans are taken out, with Raven left to fight the monsters alone. Despite denying her fear, she accepts its and regains control over her powers, vanishing the monsters in the process. She awakes to learn that the monsters accidentally came from Raven's powers as a result of her denial of fear.
name: Fear Itself

description: A new villain named Killer Moth breeds an army of insects and unleashes them on the town. However, he promises not to destroy the city only if Robin will take his daughter Kitten to her prom. Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven scope out Killer Moth's lair while Starfire, upset at the prospect of Robin going out with Kitten, attends the prom to keep a close eye on Robin.
name: Date with Destiny

description: Starfire wakes up to discover a huge forehead lump on her forehead, which leads to tusks on her neck, pointy ears, scaly skin and many more. Believing she is turning into a monster, she leaves and takes refuge on a planet deep into space. She meets a charming, kindhearted alien who dispels her fears. While she becomes encased in a chrysalis, the alien turns out to be a Tamaranian chrysalis eater. Meanwhile, the rest of the Titans search the galaxy for her, eventually finding the planet and rescuing a refreshed Starfire from peril.
name: Transformation

description: Terra returns to the Titans claiming to have control of her powers and everyone except Raven is welcoming. Meanwhile, Slade releases giant drill worms to sink the Titans' Tower.
name: Titan Rising

description: Robin, Beast Boy and Cyborg are summoned by the Master of Games to compete in a "Contest of Champions" against other super powered males. Everyone invited is willing to participate, but Cyborg becomes suspicious when he sees losing contestants vanishing.
name: Winner Take All

description: Terra and Beast Boy go out on a date during the night while the tower is under siege by Slade's minions. Slade then interrupts the date and shows Beast Boy where Terra's loyalties lie.
name: Betrayal

description: Robin is bothered by Larry, his double from a different dimension, who appears after Robin breaks his arm. While wrestling with Larry, Robin breaks Larry's magical finger, causing the city to become distorted. Villain Johnny Rancid takes advantage of the chaos and transforms himself into a darker version of himself.
name: Fractured

description: Slade sends a newly-transformed Terra to attack the Teen Titans. Unable to defeat her, the Titans retreat and regroup, planning to break Slade's grip on Terra. Terra frees Cinderblock, Overload and Plasmus for prison and through Slade, disperses them throughout the city to take down the Titans. This turns out to be a decoy to bring the Titans out of hiding and destroy them one by one.
name: Aftershock, Pt. I

description: With the Titans seemingly gone, Slade has taken control of the city, but the Titans don't go down so easily. They unleash payback on Terra for betraying them to join Slade, which leaves her feeling broken inside more than ever before. Regretting every action since her betrayal, she begs Beast Boy to finish her off before Slade takes control of the situation and causes a horrific and saddening fate that leads to his own demise.
name: Aftershock, Pt. II

description: The Titans send Cyborg undercover as Stone to investigate the HIVE's newest plan. Cyborg finds out that a new headmaster, Brother Blood, is now in charge of the academy. The plan becomes compromised as Cyborg grows fond of the popularity he has attained amongst the students and the return to his human self.
name: Deception

description: Starfire is called upon to her home planet of Tamaran to be married to create peace among her planet, only to find Blackfire as the Grand Ruler and her groom to be an unsightly alien from a distant planet. The Titans become suspicious and soon discover that there's more to Blackfire's plan than she let on.
name: Betrothed

description: Beast Boy uses Cyborg's circuitry to play a video game but accidentally releases a virus that makes him delusional and hungry. The Titans call upon tech villain Gizmo to destroy the virus affecting Cyborg. Beast Boy, feeling guilty about his mistake, joins Gizmo in destroying the virus core while facing off against the drones and Cyborg's white blood cells while Robin, Raven and Starfire stop Cyborg from eating everything in sight, including the city's communication tower.
name: Crash

description: Raven, feeling alone and isolated from the team, bonds with Malchior, a wizard trapped in her book. Wanting to be more powerful, Raven learns spells from the wizard while growing closer to him. When put to the test, the powers become more than she can handle and Raven realizes that Malchior is not who she thought he was.
name: Spellbound

deck: The gang notices that the carnival Funland is operating after close, and go to investigate. They soon discover a crazy robot running around, but when they notify the caretaker, and he says they must be mistaken, the kids can't resist the mystery.
name: Foul Play in Funland

deck: Shaggy and Scooby-Doo come across a violin case filled with money. While Scooby is distracted by a dog puppet that seems to be hurt, he leaves it by the curb, and it is stolen away. Shaggy, Scooby, and the rest of the gang find a string puppet controller, and they follow this to the local puppet theater, where they uncover a counterfeiting operation and scheme masterminded by a spooky puppet master.
name: The Backstage Rage

deck: Mystery, Inc. meets a strongman named Samson and a midget named Max, who were both on the run from a circus allegedly haunted and jinxed by a ghost clown. The gang goes to the circus grounds to investigate, but one-by-one except Velma and Fred, fall victim to the Ghost Clown's powers of hypnotism: Scooby becoming a high wire walker, Shaggy a lion-tamer and Daphne a unicycle-rider.
name: Bedlam in the Big Top

deck: While on their way to Franken Castle, the gang stops to get their fortunes told by Carlotta the Gypsy who warns them they will meet their "doom" if they go to the castle. They're soon greeted by a vampire, Frankenstein's monster and a Wolfman on the castle grounds.
name: A Gaggle of Galloping Ghosts

deck: The gang is in the Department of Archeology to help with the Mummy of Ankha display. The 3,000 year old mummy is said to be cursed and comes back to life, turning all who disturbed him into stone, while looking for an ancient coin.
name: Scooby-Doo and A Mummy, Too

deck: While lost in a scary swamp, the gang comes across a zombie who spooks them. In the near deserted town of Swamps End, they hear that a witch brought him to life with her voodoo magic, and that they have scared the townspeople away.
name: Which Witch is Which?

deck: The newspaper reports that local shipping company owner C.L. Magnus's company is going out of business, and his ships are being destroyed by the ghost of the pirate Redbeard, who is stealing the cargo. After reading the story and consulting Magnus, the gang sets out to see if they can stop the 300 year old ghost and help the freight ships he is ruining.
name: Go Away Ghost Ship

deck: The gang runs out of gas in front of an old farmhouse whose owner tells them about a ghostly flying saucer and a spooky spaceman who are haunting an abandoned airfield nearby.
name: Spooky Space Kook

deck: Scooby is named in the will of Colonel Beauregard Sanders, an eccentric millionaire he saved seven years earlier. The only way to claim any of the money though is to stay the night in the colonel's mansionthat is also inhabited by four relatives with a claim and the Phantom Shadows who want them all gone.
name: A Night of Fright is No Delight

deck: While on a skiing vacation at Wolf's End Lodge, the kids are scared by the ghost of an abominable snow creature called the Yeti. In search of their clues, the gang eventually meet a Tibetan hermit who says he is responsible for summoning the monster and track the ghost down to an old sawmill filled with surprises.
name: That's Snow Ghost

deck: On their way home from the Malt Shop, the gang encounters the ghost of Mr. Hyde, a known jewel thief, in the back of the Mystery Machine, who rushes through a marsh and sneaks into a spooky house. The house turns out to be the home of Dr. Jekyll (great-grandson of the fictional character), who fears he may be transforming into the Ghost of Mr. Hyde. The gang begins searching the house for clues, pegging the maid as a likely suspect, but are pursued at every turn by the ghost.
name: Nowhere to Hyde

deck: After attending a Chinese New Year parade, the gang goes shopping in a curio shop where Daphne buys a golden mask. Pretty soon she discovers that it was stolen centuries ago from the crypt of Zen Tuo, and that two zombies want the mask back.
name: Mystery Mask Mix-Up

deck: While out fishing, Shaggy and Scooby hook a two million year old frozen caveman that was lost at sea during a violent storm. The gang takes him to Oceanland, but when someone melts the caveman from the ice and the scientists are acting strange, the gang decides to stick around and investigate.
name: Scooby's Night with a Frozen Fright

deck: While on their way to their High School Barn Dance, the gang comes across a knocked-out bank guard and his ransacked car. After he mumbles to them some clues, they discover that the local bank has been getting robbed by a mysterious zombie-like phantom called the Creeper.
name: Jeepers, It's the Creeper

deck: The Mystery Machine overheats in front of an old spooky mansion, and the gang goes to look for help but only find horror in a headless specter. But what is the mysterious knocking sounds they hear, and are the clues all over the house leading them to a hidden treasure?
name: Haunted House Hang-Up

deck: Shaggy and Scooby's package vacation of Hawaii is interrupted by a witch doctor, who warns the tourists and natives they are on the sacred grounds of the island god Mano Tiki Tia. The gang searches for Mr. Sims, their guide, in an ancient village of a lost tribe and discover lots of pearls and a mystery.
name: A Tiki Scare is No Fair

deck: The gang is camping and hears the sounds of a wolf that they track to an old graveyard and the open grave of Silas Long, who was suspected of being a werewolf. They follow his tracks to an old, abandoned sawmill filled with wool and empty barrels and the creepy werewolf.
name: Who's Afraid of the Big Bad Werewolf?

deck: While participating in the Johnny Sands Dance Game Show, the teens encounter the wax phantom that steals a safe full of money and kidnaps the station manager. Is the phantom all a hoax or is it the curse of an old employee seeking revenge for the cancellation of his show?
name: Don't Fool with a Phantom

deck: Doctor. Meet the Daleks!
description:
Written by: Terry Nation

Directed by: Christopher Barry (Episodes 1,2,4,5) Richard Martin (Episodes 3,6,7)

Episode 1: The Dead Planet

Episode 2: The Survivors

Episode 3: The Escape

Episode 4: The Ambush

Episode 5: The Expedition

Episode 6: The Ordeal

Episode 7: The Rescue

Synopsis:

The TARDIS has brought the travellers to the planet Skaro where they meet two indigenous races - the Daleks, malicious mutant creatures encased in armoured travel machines, and the Thals, beautiful humanoids with pacifist principles. They convince the Thals of the need to fight for their own survival.

Joining forces with them and braving Skaro's many dangers, they launch a two-pronged attack on the Dalek city. The Daleks are all killed when, during the course of the fighting, their power supply is cut off.
name: The Daleks

description: The Titans are faced with a dilemma when Red X returns, causing concern among the team towards Robin. Realizing that the new villain is after xenothium, a powerful element that powers the suit, the Titans scramble to find Red X. As the Titans close in on Red X, Cyborg, Raven, Beast Boy, and Starfire are captured by Professor Chang, who has his own plans for the xenothium.
name: X

description: While the Titans face off against Cinderblock, Robin encounters Slade, who plans to cause an earthquake within the city using seismic generators. The Titans split up to find the generators, only to find nothing. After witnessing Robin fighting himself, the team become concerned that his obsession with Slade has manifested into a delusion. Despite capturing him, the Titans soon realize that Slade may be more real that they thought.
name: Haunted
